div.font: Briefly explain the time, background, overall process, grades, results, etc. of work or study......
I am pleased to report that my grades have steadily improved, and my class ranking has risen......

span.font: I am proud to share my recent achievements in my studies. My average grades have steadily improved over the past few months......

div.font: Spring offers a break from the cold and darkness of winter, allowing people to get outside and enjoy the beauty of the natural world......
Spring is a season of renewal and rebirth, where nature awakens from its winter slumber......
Spring is a season that represents new beginnings and renewal. It is a time of rebirth and growth after the long, dark days of winter......
